reviewText: This movie was based on a true event and it's a shame. You just don't know who to trust.
I've never seen a bad Richard Thomas movie.  I  shines in everything,  and is one of my favorites.  This film is no exception.

I don't think I've ever seen a bad movie with Richard Thomas in it.
This is no exception.  I thoroughly enjoyed it and am sure to watch it again.

This movie was a good selection.  Richard Thomas was excellent in his character.  Its still hard for me to see him as a evil doer rather than that sweet, innocent kid on "The Waltons." I could watch this movie again.  Its a lifetime sunday movie.
